lines.text: There's absolutely no reason yet to fear the worst. Until now, we only know that the plane caught fire and we've lost radio contact.
Tell me, are you always so quiet?
You know, when you've lived on an island for a long time, you forget how to say nice things to girls.
Well, I'm really glad that your aeroplane crashed.
I don't know any girls and when I think of the ones I do, I'd rather work.
Same old story - you're nice to a man and before you know it, he's getting thrashed.

[to Bobby]
For a guy like you, the worst girl in the world is too good!
What are dancers? Hot goods for cold nights.
Gary! Look what I just found.
A hammer! There must be someone on this island! A hammer... with a long handle... It must be for the purpose of excavating some sort of metal, most probably Uranium.
